      • mkFace

        public Face mkFace(Vertex start,
          Vertex v,
          java.util.ArrayList<Edge> apartOfFace,
          int curr,
          int[] seen,
          int faceLabel,
          Face[][] sharedEdge)
        Recursively constructs a single Face
        Parameters:
        start - - the starting vertex of the face
        v - - a neighbor of a previous vertex
        apartOfFace - - list of edges that are apart of the face
        curr - - current index of the next neighbor in v's adj list
        Returns:
        a new Face or null if an edge has been seen more than twice

        Parameters:
        path - - set of edges whose dual should not be created
